answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
This sounds almost like an information management position (not IT, but almost like a librarian).  Are you looking for resources/contacts for how they can improve information gathering and dissemination? (plus all the associated PD)? Or am I misunderstanding their role?

answers.author: Trey Williams
answers.text:
Hi Sarah,
I'm not exactly sure of what you mean by "county liaison". I have looked to see if I can find any comparable positions and nothing is turning up, except liaison committees between counties and other organizations. Is this more of a "constituent services representative" that helps citizens coordinate between staff and the elected officials on issues? Thanks.


Hi Sarah,

I'm not exactly sure of what you mean by "county liaison". I have looked to see if I can find any comparable positions and nothing is turning up, except liaison committees between counties and other organizations. Is this more of a "constituent services representative" that helps citizens coordinate between staff and the elected officials on issues? Thanks.

author: Sarah Tone
text: We are looking for professional development resources and contacts for our County Liaisons. The liaisons are a contact for elected officials, staff, and citizens for information and issue management. In addition to professional development tools, does anyone ave a list of duties that this type of position performs?
title: County Liaison-Exchanging Information Between Elected Officials, Staff, and Citizens
